jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer (Flutter, Dart native iOS, native Android)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Germany

Role: Mobile Developer (Flutter, Dart)
Permanent position in Hamburg

Remote until pandemic is over, but should be in Germany already

mobile dev

Tech Stack: flutter, dart, mobile, ios, android

7+ years of experience

English must have, german big plus

Start date: end of q1

At Engel & V√∂lkers Technology, we are reimagining our own industry. An industry that we have excelled in for over 40 years and has transformed Engel & V√∂lkers into one of the world‚Äôs leading service companies specialised in the brokerage of premium residential property, commercial real estate, yachts and aircraft. Despite our successes, we see the need to be on the leading edge of innovation and always be pushing the boundaries of the industry. As a software engineer, you will be involved in developing property-tech that will revamp an entire industry. You will own the full software development lifecycle of your products and work on complex problems with startup agility at enterprise scale with global impact.

Our development ecosystem:
‚Ä¢ Languages: Java, Golang, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Elixir, Objective-C, Swift, Dart/Flutter
‚Ä¢ Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, OracleDB, Redis
‚Ä¢ CI/CD Toolchain: Jenkins, Saltstack, Artifactory
‚Ä¢ Project Management: JIRA, Confluence
‚Ä¢ We believe in using the best tool for the job, you make your case

Your responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Plan, design and implement end-to-end solutions for products with your team and product owners
‚Ä¢ Develop mobile solutions over all layers of the stack for our new B2B, B2C and internal applications
‚Ä¢ Participate actively in technical discussions and presentations with fellow engineers and iterate on technologies and practices
‚Ä¢ Be a solid team player as part of an agile, autonomous team and contribute to the development of fellow engineers

Your profile:
‚Ä¢ Experience designing and delivering mobile applications meeting industry standards and complying to internal SLAs
‚Ä¢ Extensive knowledge of software engineering best practices covering the full software development lifecycle
‚Ä¢ Several years of proven software development experience
‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of Dart and Flutter as well as Swift or Kotlin
‚Ä¢ Experience with at least one native mobile platform Android or iOS
‚Ä¢ Understands the importance of a well organized codebase and documentation
‚Ä¢ Capable of implementing unit, integration, end-to-end and load testing of developed applications
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Computer or Electrical Engineering, Business Informatics or equivalency in relevant work experience

Pluses:
‚Ä¢ Experience in the real estate industry, ideally in PropTech
‚Ä¢ Experience with DevOps and Continuous Integration and Delivery
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Redux for Flutter
‚Ä¢ Experience working with socket-based communication protocols such as gRPC or Websockets
‚Ä¢ Public GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket account with demonstrable coding projects

This offer from "devop1" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 75% flex score.

Mit meiner Idee setze ich nicht auf Revolution sondern auf Evolution und greife auf alt bekanntes zur√ºck, interpretiere es neu und implementiere neue und attraktive Funktionen. Grob gesagt sollen in einer nativen App beliebte online Kommunikationsm√∂glichkeiten zusammengef√ºgt und gleichzeitig eine L√ºcke zwischen den g√§ngigen sozialen Netzwerken geschlossen werden. Attraktiv ist das Angebot, weil es leicht zug√§nglich, anonym, klar strukturiert und einfach in der Handhabung ist. Zudem bietet es schnellen und √ºbersichtlichen Informationsaustausch zwischen den Nutzern. Genauere Informationen inkl. Artworks und dem bisher erarbeiteteten Funktionsumfang gibts dann im pers√∂nlichen Kontakt.Was ich suche:Da ich selber sehr unerfahren in der technischen Umsetzung einer nativen Applikation bin, suche ich einen Mitgr√ºnder der sich von meiner Idee mitrei√üen l√§sst, bereit ist diese im gemeinsamen Prozess weiter zu entwickeln und sein technisches know how mit einbringt. Der wichtigste Punkt ist allerdings die Begeisterungsf√§higkeit und der Wille etwas von Anfang bis Ende durch zu ziehen.Also wenn du dich angesprochen f√ºhlst, freue ich mich √ºber Kontakt und ein gemeinsames Treffen. Sei von Anfang an Teil von etwas neuem und gro√üartigem...

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer (Junior/Mid-level) - Automotive
jobs_results.description:
Position

iOS Developer (Junior/Mid-level) ‚Äì Automotive

Munich; Ingolstadt; Porto
Professional

We are looking for experienced and highly ambitious software developers who are motivated to develop high-end mobile applications in the field of automotive industry. Together with our customers it is our goal to shape and offer the best possible user experience for upcoming customer applications. Join our journey and become a part of our team!

RESPONSIBILITIES

You will
> enjoy writing high-performing and easy to maintain code in Swift
> develop new iOS applications using cutting-edge technology (MVVM)
> understand how important code testing is
> like to work in an interdisciplinary team in an agile environment delivering solutions to leading car manufacturers

REQUIREMENTS

> University degree in Computer Science or in one comparable study or professional experience
> 1+ years of professional experience with iOS (Swift/SwiftUI/Objective-C) using MVVM
> Experience with GIT, Automated Testing and Fastlane
> Like to work in a dynamic and multicultural team
> Proficient in English, spoken and written
Nice to have:
> German language skills
> Knowledge of C++ or any other computer language
> Experience with Reactive Extensions, AWS services and Bluetooth

BENEFITS

> A highly innovative, agile and unique team with a great working culture and an employer that appreciates news initiatives and ideas
> kununu.de can give you an impression of our working culture! (

Pixida is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer! We are committed to a work environment that supports, inspires and respects all individuals and in which all aspects of employment are applied without discrimination. Therefore we encourage all individuals to apply!

In order to be able to get a comprehensive overview of your application, we ask you to make sure to include certificates, employer's references, etc. with your resume. In addition, we ask you to provide information about your possible start date, salary expectations and language skills.

Ready to take your career
to the next level?

Tiago Faro
E-Mail auf connecticum.de ansehen

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer (D√ºsseldorf)
jobs_results.description:
As we continue to grow, we are seeking for talented people to join our team.

Job description

Join our growing team where you will take ownership of your role and contribute actively with your ideas on new projects in a creative and stimulating working environment. You should be able to take responsibility and handle your tasks independently. Also, you will have a dedicated time to improve yourself, do research on favourite topics, and learn cutting-edge technologies.

Come and join us!

Responsibilities

Plan, develop, deploy, and maintain software solutions

Choose software technologies and architectures

Take leadership

Define tasks and give time estimates

Write clean, maintainable code and test it

Collaborate with clients: both technical and non-technical team members

Be able to present your solutions in front of clients and group of colleagues

Use agile methodologies in development, participate in code reviews, pair programming, and other knowledge sharing activities

Continually improve your skills and push others to go forward with their knowledge

Requirements

At least 4 years of experience working as an iOS Developer

Excellent computer science fundamentals, especially in OOP

Excellent knowledge of the Cocoa Touch framework, based on Swift or Objective-C

Excellent knowledge in reactive programming (RxSwift, ReactiveCocoa)

Experience with software architecture (MVVM, VIPER, MVC)

Ability to write clean and testable code as well as unit tests

Excellent debugging skills

Experience working in a team environment

Excellent English skills

Great salary and bonuses

Free books

Apply for this position

Send us an email with your CV or fill the form below and start your new challenge at troido.

jobs_results.title: iOS Engineer (m/f/d)
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Bonial.com, part of Axel Springer SE, is a leading drive to store marketing partner across Europe and South America. Bonial inspires millions of shoppers each month by connecting them with their favorite brands & retailers.

More than 1500 retailers & brands across all retail sectors rely on the tailor-made, data driven marketing solutions from Bonial.com to promote their offers & reach measurable business results with maximized return on investment.

Job Description

The Team:

Our iOS Team works in a small international team, closely together with the Android and the backend teams. Our outstanding team spirit is driven by flat hierarchies, a high degree of self-organization and a high degree of technology freedom. If you have a strong motivation to create a state-of-the-art app and to deliver high-quality code, by using code reviews, test automation and clean app architecture, let‚Äôs talk.

As an iOS Developer in our Mobile development team, you make significant contributions to the development of the Bonial Products in Germany and France for iOS smartphones and tablets.

Furthermore, you will...
‚Ä¢ Assist with the conception and evaluation of new features and software architectures.
‚Ä¢ Realize device, performance, and stability tests, utilizing code review and continuous integration.
‚Ä¢ Improve your experience in developing mobile applications and define easy to understand cross-platform solutions.
‚Ä¢ Develop high-traffic international products with a focus on quality and stability
‚Ä¢ Work with innovative technologies and methods
As a Senior iOS Developer in our company, you will have the opportunity to:
‚Ä¢ Give a significant contribution to our Apps (KaufDA, MeinProspekt and Bonial) and Business
‚Ä¢ Gain experience in software design and architecture like VIPER
‚Ä¢ Explore technologies like AWS, Appium & Buddybuild
‚Ä¢ Be a team player in our cross-functional set-up
‚Ä¢ Build an app in the spirit of a Lean/Agile (Scrum, Kanban, Scrum-ban)
‚Ä¢ Room to grow: you'll have the opportunity to bring your ideas to the table and take on real responsibilities

Qualifications

If you have ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of practical iOS Development experience
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of web technologies and web services (e.g. HTTPS, JSON, REST)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of iOS SDK and frameworks
‚Ä¢ Experiences in OOP in Swift & Objective-C
‚Ä¢ Interest in current trends in the area of mobile software development and mobile apps
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with automation testing concepts and continuous integration
‚Ä¢ A team player attitude and always lending a hand and take on a new challenges
‚Ä¢ Creativity, ambition, drive and reliability
‚Ä¢ Fluent communication skills in English, German is NOT required!

Then come and apply!

Additional Information

Once you are part of Bonial, we offer you great opportunities to grow. We have a clear career path, depending on your personal goals. In order to reach these goals, you have feedback talks with your team lead on a regular basis. Additionally, you can enjoy the view of on our roof terrace during our monthly meetups and regular team- and company events.

More (fun)facts:
‚Ä¢ Bonial is celebrating its 10th birthday this year!
‚Ä¢ Did you know that employee number one is still working at our company?
‚Ä¢ And our own CMO started as a trainee back in 2012.
‚Ä¢ We have a shiny new office with a good view of the sights of Berlin.
‚Ä¢ We have some seriously impressive Karaoke singers in the company!
‚Ä¢ For parents ‚Äì we have a nice Family-room in case your Kita is bailing on you..
